```pddl
[
  (:action make
    :parameters (?mixture - mixture ?p - agent ?kitchen - location)
    :precondition (and 
      (inventory ?p ?mixture)
      (separate ?mixture)
      (at ?p ?kitchen)
      (heating_element ?kitchen off)
      (counter ?kitchen clean)
      (stove_knob ?kitchen off)
      (not (cooked ?mixture))
    )
    :effect (and
      (not (separate ?mixture))
      (cooked ?mixture)
    )
  )

  (:action add
    ; Add an item to a container and update its state
    :parameters (?actor - agent ?item - object ?container - container ?location - location)
    :precondition (and 
        (at ?actor ?location) 
        (inventory ?actor ?item) 
        (not (full ?container)) 
        (not (contains ?container ?item))
    )
    :effect (and 
        (not (empty ?container))
        (contains ?container ?item)
        (not (inventory ?actor ?item))
    )
  )

  (:action heat
    ; Heat an object using a heating device
    :parameters (?entity - object ?device - heating_device ?setting - heat ?agent - agent ?location - location)
    :precondition (and 
        (at ?agent ?location) 
        (contains ?device ?entity) 
        (ready ?device) 
        (off ?device)
    )
    :effect (and 
        (on ?device) 
        (heating ?entity) 
        (temperature ?entity hot)
    )
  )
]
```
